named-query.name: Restaurant.retrieveByNameAndCuisineId
named-query.query: from Restaurant where name like concat('%', :name, '%') and cuisine.id = :id

named-query.name: Restaurant.existsResponsibleUser
named-query.query: select case when count(1) > 0 then true else false end from Restaurant rest join rest.responsibleUsers resp where rest.id = :restaurantId and resp.id = :userId
